channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA

channel.desc: Alice Levine joins Richard for a 48-hour fling around the Estonian capital, Tallinn; over two days, Richard and Alice rip round the city's sights, summit the country's highest structure, nosh at its top restaurant and stroke Sean Connery's face.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
channel.desc: Jamie has some cracking family recipes to share; for a new take on using delicious sustainable white fish, Jamie rustles up gorgeous smoked haddock fish cakes, served with a beautifully creamy chive sauce that can't fail to impress.
